snippet: The specter of the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks hangs over the Royal Air Force operation at the Olympics, and the lessons learned from those attacks are central to its planning.
abstract: Royal Air Force Station Northolt Journal; British Royal Air Force pilots at Northholt airfield are prepared to scramble in an instant to intercept any aircraft that poses a threat to Olympic installations; the specter of the September 11, 2001, attacks hang over the operation, and the lessons learned from those attacks are central to its planning.
lead_paragraph: The specter of the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks hangs over the Royal Air Force operation at the Olympics, and the lessons learned from those attacks are central to its planning.

headline.seo: At Olympics, Royal Air Force on Terrorism Alert
headline.content_kicker: Royal Air Force Station Northolt Journal
